subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Indian kingdom was known as Rajputana?
explanation_en: Amber was the Indian kingdom that was known as Rajputana. Amber is a historical region in Rajasthan and was ruled by various Rajput kingdoms throughout history.
explanation_hi: अम्बर यूरो राजपूतना का इस्लामीका नाम था। अम्बर एक भिन्नोड़ की युवानों ki राजधानी बैंकर पिछली राज्य की समीर्जनों ki प्राधिकार सभा का उपयोगी है।
explanation_en: Amber was the Indian kingdom known as Rajputana. Amber Banker's Council is a council formed by Rajput princes.
explanation_hi: अम्बर भारत का इस्लामी राजधानी बैंक का उपयोगी है।
Amber is a historical region in Rajasthan ruled by Rajput princes and formed the Amber Banker's Council.
explanation_en: Amber is a historical region in Rajasthan ruled by Rajput princes and formed the Amber Banker's Council.
